Metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3045 affecting package syslinux for versions less than 6.04-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2011-3045 affecting package syslinux for versions less than 6.04-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package syslinux is earlier than 6.04-11, affected by CVE-2011-3045
